description: Archipel Configuration. You must configure folowing parameters to start the Archipel Chain and also a Polkadot node. [README](https://github.com/luguslabs/archipel#archipel)

config_file_password.title: Archipel Zip Config File Password
config_file_password.description: Optional password for the Archipel Zip Config File

archipel_telemetry_url.title: Archipel TELEMETRY URL
archipel_telemetry_url.description: Optional TELEMETRY_URL for Archipel substrate node. Example : `ws://BACKEND_PUBLIC_IP:8000/submit 0`. Log level number must be set after URL. Can be an url list separated by `,` | empty or 'URL1 0,URL2 0' or `--no-telemetry`

polkadot_telemetry_url.title: Polkadot TELEMETRY URL
polkadot_telemetry_url.description: Optional TELEMETRY_URL for Polkadot Node.  Example : `ws://BACKEND_PUBLIC_IP:8000/submit 0`. Log level number must be set after URL. Can be an url list separated by `,` | empty or 'URL1 0,URL2 0' or `--no-telemetry`

polkadot_prefix.title: Polkadot prefix docker volume
polkadot_prefix.description: docker prefix volume for polkadot container data : kusama-data-

polkadot_image.title: Polkadot Docker Image
polkadot_image.description: docker image to use like : parity/polkadot:v0.8.19

polkadot_backup_url.title: Polkadot backup URL
polkadot_backup_url.description: URL to previous chain data backup. To start quicky or to restore to specific clean base

polkadot_validator_name.title: Polkadot Validator Name
polkadot_validator_name.description: Validator name of the group to be supervised in web3 telemetry.

polkadot_name.title: Polkadot Name
polkadot_name.description: Passive node name for this instance
